title: no RP?
body: so i redeemed a RP card yesterday, it was acknowledged and yet no RP? and im unable to redeem the code again? what do?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Please see [this announcement](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/cLeYquE0-rp-card-redemption-issue-21042016) thread regarding the recent issue with redeeming RP cards.

If after the rollback has been applied and all pending transactions finalised you are still yet to receive your RP please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they will assist you further.

yeah i'm still waiting on my $75 worth from yesterday XD I've seen around that they are looking into it now, but i'm yet to get a proper reply back on my ticket or my RP that i paid for :P not sure how they will be giving everyone their RP but i've been told by the Wrenchmen to submit a ticket to Riot but not to keep adding to it as it will push you back further in the queue. So patience i guess XD
